name: SNOWBALL MIGHT!
description:
• WASD or ↑↓→← to move!
  • Left Click to fire a snowball (only while standing still!)
  • When you level up, choose a new ability from the randomized ability list.
  • Collect piles of snow while defeating suns!
  • Last as long as you can. When summer hits, things really heat up!

I made this game over the course of 4 days + 1 publishing day as a first time project. I wanted to put something out there that was decent fun for a round or two, short (so that I'd finish it), and thematic (where I'm from, spring and summer is just around the corner).

I hope you enjoy taking a look into the beginning of my game development journey.

If you're interested in working with me, check out my profile! I'm a 26 year old Canadian Indie Dev and I'm looking for other young, ambitious developers to join me in creating a fun, innovative, and lucrative studio.

Please send me a message at discord to chat! "Zach HHG#1433"
